body.name: ZINUS 5 Inch Memory Foam Mattress, Fiberglass Free, Bunk Bed, Trundle Bed, Day Bed Compatible, Narrow Twin, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 20 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Memory, comfort and base foams with a moisture-resistant terry fabric cover

SUPPORTIVE FOAM LAYERS - Green tea-infused memory foam and enveloping comfort foam combine with durable base foam to cradle your shape in pressure-relieving comfort; all wrapped in a terry cover with a moisture barrier to protect against spills and messes

AFFORDABLE REST, CERTIFIED QUALITY - Experience the luxury of high-quality CertiPUR-certified foams without breaking the bank. This fiberglass-free mattress offers unparalleled value and is developed for quality, durability and ultimate comfort.

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and it expands to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10-year limited warranty included; supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs
Please confirm measurements of third-party brand bed frames before pairing with the AmazonUs/ZINUS 5 Inch Memory Foam Mattress, as compatibility is not guaranteed.
body.description: Made to perfectly suit your child’s bed, our 5 Inch Youth Memory Foam Mattress is a comfortable choice that your kids can sleep on undisturbed. It comes with a green-tea infused memory foam layer that eliminates smelly smells to the natural curves of the body for customized sleep. And a dense base foam layer with wave dynamics construction increases airflow so your child can sleep cooler and more soundly. This mattress is compressed and rolled into one box that arrives at your doorstep, ready to be easily unboxed and ready for bedtime in 72 hours or less. Plus, we’ve included a 10-year worry-free warranty for ultimate peace of mind. It’s the mattress designed to please you just as much as it does your well-rested kiddos.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete your bedroom 5" Memory Foam Mattress Kai Bamboo & Metal Bed Copper Cooling Topper Materials Green Tea Memory Foam, Zinus Comfort Foam(R), Zinus Base FoamTM Materials Steel, sustainable bamboo Materials Copper memory foam Premium infusion Green tea Assembly All tools included, under 1 hour Assembly Unbox and decompress 48 - 72 hrs Available sizes Narrow twin, twin Available sizes Twin, full, queen, king Available profiles 1.25, 2, 3"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for My Traveling Musician Lifestyle!
reviews.reviewText: As a traveling musician constantly on the road, I can't express how delighted I am with the ZINUS 5 Inch Memory Foam Mattress. This narrow twin mattress has been an absolute game-changer for my travel trailer, and it unquestionably deserves a 5-star rating.First and foremost, the compact size of this mattress is ideal for my space-constrained travel trailer. It fits perfectly, providing a comfortable and supportive sleeping surface without taking up unnecessary room. It's a true space-saver without compromising on comfort.The memory foam is a dream to sleep on. It conforms to my body, relieving pressure points and ensuring a restful night's sleep even on the bumpiest of roads. I wake up feeling refreshed and ready to hit the stage.The fact that this mattress is fiberglass-free is a significant advantage. It eliminates any worries about fiberglass particles escaping and causing discomfort, especially during long trips. It's a thoughtful design choice that enhances the overall comfort and safety of the mattress.The versatility of this mattress is impressive. It's compatible with bunk beds, trundle beds, and day beds, making it a valuable addition to various sleeping arrangements. It's a mattress that can adapt to different scenarios, which is perfect for a musician's unpredictable lifestyle.The quality and durability of the ZINUS mattress are evident. It has held up exceptionally well through countless journeys and performances, which speaks to its long-lasting value.In summary, the ZINUS 5 Inch Memory Foam Mattress has transformed my travel trailer into a cozy haven for rest and relaxation while on tour. Its compact size, memory foam comfort, fiberglass-free design, and versatility make it a perfect fit for my traveling musician lifestyle. I couldn't be happier with this mattress, and I wholeheartedly give it a 5-star rating. If you're a traveler in need of a comfortable and space-saving mattress, look no further – this one's a winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for trundle bed!
reviews.reviewText: We got the 5 inch twin size mattress and the 6 inch zippered mattress protector. Set it up and put the mattress protector on and in less than 24 hours it’s grown a lot in thickness and length. I taste say that it’s already at its full size. It’s perfect!! And super comfortable to lay on. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit of a gap.
reviews.reviewText: The first mattress I used for my son’s bunk filled out the space great but was too tall to allow the safety rails to do their job. This one is just the right height and perfectly comfortable but there is a good sized gap on the end where it isn’t quite long enough to reach the head or foot of the bunk. It’s about three inches. I rolled up a blanket to fill in that space, but I am afraid he might get his leg or arm caught if I’m not super vigilant about keeping that blanket in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Bunkbeds
reviews.reviewText: We recently got a triple bunk bed as we needed to consolidate space and it was hard to figure out. These mattress fit PERFECTLY in each bunk and each kid loves the soft yet firmness of them and they sleep like rocks on these things. Amazing price, great feel, perfect packing and delivery. Not a single issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, can’t beat it.
reviews.reviewText: Great price! Comfort is good but remember it’s only 5 inch pad so keep that in mind! Would recommend for spare bedroom bed that doesn’t get used often or would recommend as a mattress topper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only 4" of foam with an air gap, usless broken zipper and lots of loose fiberglass!
reviews.reviewText: This "mattress" arrived quick and tightly packed in a bag in a box. They seal the bag with extra room so it can be resealed and vacuumed shrunk for returns, which I'll be doing.Once I got mine out of the bag, I noticed the zipper was "popped". The zipper is NOT meant to be removed or opened, it is a "one-way" zipper for closing only, it doesn't go backwards. I was able to remove the zipper to close where it popped but the zip just started opening behind it again.From there I was starting to itch because the fiberglass fire retardant material was leeching through the cloth cover. The cover itself is vinyl? backed and is very noisy. I guess it's meant to keep the fiberglass from poking through but the sides are open cloth so you can see where shards are poking out of the sides. The top view where it looks shiny is because of the fiberglass cover.I had originally bought this to cut it open for a motor home mattress but because of the poor quality and the fact that it's literally falling apart as the air is getting to it, I've already had enough of it.Since it was already open, there's only 4" of foam inside and an inch of that is the airpocket from the eggcrate foam. I tried to lay on it. For camping it would probably not be all that bad. It didn't smell that bad, it was more noticeable in the Airstream in an enclosed space.I know most of these "bed in a box" mattresses are going to have fiberglass as a fire retardant inside, but seriously, there has to be a safer way of keeping it contained. Or at least a cover where it doesn't just leech out. Did you ever sleep on a real feather down pillow with a cheap pillow case on it? That is this mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought I order the 8 inch but it’s 5inches. It’s so thin. But perfect for a toddler. Not a good choice for any child over 7 believe me!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and thick
reviews.reviewText: Got this to put on a loft bed. It is very nice and thick. I got the pink version and I would say the color is a lot darker than what is depicted in the image. I would call it a deep magenta color.The color works out fine for us but keep that in mind if you are more particular on color shade.The topper does zip off for easy cleaning. Kiddo loves it

I bought this to replace an old, uncomfortable, spongy, 3" foam mattress which offered no support, and had odour issues. This 5" memory foam mattress is exactly as advertised and is perfect for my needs on a camping cot! It quickly expanded to 5" after unpacking it. It is very firm, supportive and comfortable for my big and tall guy needs. No odours! Great price too!

Es un producto de excelente calidad, es muy cómodo y suave. Fue fácil abrirlo, el colchón recuperó su forma original en menos de 5 min. Es algo angosto por si buscas tener el espacio de una cama individual promedio, aún así funciona bastante bien para adultos. 10/10
I would recommend this product one of the finest quality of mattress i do have queen as well same comfort
Parece de muy buena calidad. Está mucho más cómodo de lo que imaginamos. Además se puede lavar fácilmente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Its a mattress and its comfy, its just a tad short.
reviews.reviewText: Got the mattress to replace ones in our camper. Measured twice as the always say, but somehow the mattress came in about 2" shorter then the dimensions described on the posting, the width however was a nice snug fit (perfectly happy with the width). Looking on the bright side, it gave room for water bottle phones etc. Comfy mattress too, overall I'm happy. I guess now I know what it feels like to come up two inches short.
